CustomField.description: Optional shipping city for the item's ordered on the order line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent order's "Shipping City" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional shipping city for the item's ordered on the order line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent order's "Shipping City" field.
CustomField.label: Shipping City
